nodes.text: The Imperial Anti-Propaganda Enforcer was an Imperial badge awarded to individuals who conducted anti-propaganda efforts against Rebel Alliance cells during Empire Day. Those rewarded with the badge were held in high esteem by both the Empire and its citizenry.
One such badge was awarded to a spacer who removed several Rebel posters during the Empire Day festivities of 1 ABY.

The Imperial Badge of Meritorious Service appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
